title: Classic Bus needed in the Maidenhead area for music video

posts.content:
Hi all,
A lady from the National Film School has contacted me, she needs a bus for a music video shoot on this coming saturday. Saturday the 9th. She would prefer a stock camper if possible ?
If you are interested and can help out then please contact her on
Annys Hamilton
Production Manager
NFTS
07824446924
or email her on annys_hamilton@hotmail.com

Thanks,
Neil
